##### Q4.
```{python}
import numpy as np

asian_ptg_mean= sum(df_midwest["asian_ptg"])/437
df_midwest["large_small"]=np.where(df_midwest["asian_ptg"] > asian_ptg_mean, "large", "small")
df_midwest
```
